block.p: Anthony Orphanos Fund: Warburg Pincus Growth and Income; $280 million in assets. Manager since 1992. (Sponsor: Warburg Pincus Counsellors, New York.)
Anthony Orphanos Fund: Warburg Pincus Growth and Income; $280 million in assets. Manager since 1992. (Sponsor: Warburg Pincus Counsellors, New York.)

Born: Sept. 1, 1945; Boston. Education: A.B., economics, Harvard; M.B.A., New York University. Last Vacation: One week in Morocco in May with his wife. Fund Performance: One year, through June: +8.3% (all growth and income funds: +1.6%); three years, annualized: +17.8% (+9.6%).* Market View: *** (self-rating; ***** = most bearish). Stock Pick: Honeywell Inc., the industrial control systems manufacturer, which "will benefit from an increased level of capital investment over the next decade." Current Strategy: Value oriented. "I'm long-term bullish, but very wary about the stock market over the next six months." *Source: Morningstar Inc.
